title: Is Quran created or uncreated Are letters words of Quran Allah's words or only what we hear assim al
transcript: chat from Iraq he says the Quran is one of Allah's attributes so is it the words and the letters or only what we hear everything of the Quran is what you read what you hear what you recite this is karamallah now if you mean that is the paper which the Quran is written on is it not created the answer is no of course it's created the ink that it was written by or with it is created but the thing you read the thing you recite the thing you see the thing you hear this is where Allah azzawajal spoke it and uh given it and revealed it to us
